A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star wars hyper fans are more divided more than ever. This is the first time I seriously have issues with the last jedi haters. I usually respect other persons' opinions\, but the haters are just ramming their opinions and actively trying to sway on the people who loved it. Claiming a true star wars fans wouldn't love it\, claiming that is not how luke skywalker should be and Disney ruins star wars. Stop that! This is the best Mark Hamill's performance\, Disney is doing fine with starwars except them dealing with the movie theater and monopolizing film industry. I love the movie\, it's on par with empire strikes back and more people should just enjoy last jedi.
